Summary: a number of spheres revolving in a circle
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around June 18th 1953
divs: Sighting DetailsI was waiting for my friend to finish his dinner so I stayed outside in the garden.I decided to lie down on the lawn looking up into the sky,which was broken clouds with large patches of blue,when I noticed several,what seemed like large white spheres revolving around in a circle.I'm not very good at judging hieghts but they were high above the clouds.The strange thing is they appeared to fade in and out as they revolved.They were still there when I left to go home.I wrote a letter to ufo society at the time but didn't hear anything more,so I forgot all about it until I watched a tv program about the work that you do
